pages.text: Here are a few structures to look out for while exploring The Aurorian.

pages.title: Surface Ruins
pages.text: Some ruins you can find, contains a furnace for some early smelting!

pages.title: Underground Ruins
pages.text: Ruins you find underground that can contain valuable loot!

pages.title: Runestone Dungeon
pages.text: The dungeon you need to clear to move on to the Darkstone Dungeon.

pages.title: Darkstone Dungeon
pages.text: Second dungeon you can enter once you defeat the Runestone Dungeon boss.

pages.title: Moon Temple
pages.text: The final dungeon after completing the Darkstone Dungeon.

pages.title: Lockpicks
pages.text: More info about dungeons and how to get through them is located in the $(#008cff)Mod Progression$() section.
